content.raw:
I tried playing back the log files as suggested by the srcsim task description. I get a fatal error. Gazebo crashes when trying to play the logs
Anything I am missing?

harishb@harishb-Macmini:~/.gazebo/log/2016-12-09T19:33:15.158920/gzserver$ gazebo -u -p state.log 
[FATAL] [1481670309.285445068]: A ROS node for Gazebo has not been initialized, unable to load plugin. Load the Gazebo system plugin 'libgazebo_ros_api_plugin.so' in the gazebo_ros package)
